message: Very thoughtful article, not just about Windows 8, but the history of business adaption of IT software, namely OSes.
name: Windows 8 is the new XP | ZDNet
caption: www.zdnet.com
description: Summary: This new version of Windows is a disaster. Power users can't wait to replace the UI, and businesses are avoiding it like the plague. I'm talking, of course, about Windows XP. Ah, how quickly we forget.
